dc:title:
From Union Square to Rome,
Introduction
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Explains she is writing the book to answer her Communist brother and friend's question: "How could you become a Catholic?"
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 200 1938-01-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
